regen.absent_element: situation of execution timing under fault conditions
regen.new_specification: Continuous BIT, in conjunction with Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations, shall take less than 3 milliseconds under fault conditions while operating within the 50Hz rategroup.

regen.absent_element: missing specification for execution timing under fault conditions
regen.new_specification: Continuous BIT, while processing faults, shall execute within 3 milliseconds to ensure timely response and integration with the rest of the operations.

Continuous BIT shall take less than 3 milliseconds under fault conditions, while running in conjunction with Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations in the 50Hz rategroup after the application tasks.

label: Continuous BIT shall take less than 3 milliseconds while processing faults.
